item.title: KBW says shares of MicroStrategy, now called Strategy, to jump nearly 70%, company may be added to S&P 500
item.description: Keefe, Bruyette & Woods says MicroStrategy has big upside potential thanks to its novel and ambitious bitcoin treasury strategy.

item.title: Here are Friday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Amazon, Pinterest, Netflix, Broadcom, Expedia, Honeywell and more
item.description: Here are the biggest calls on Wall Street on Friday.

item.title: Wall Street analysts say buy the dip in Amazon, see upside ahead because of AI
item.description: Wall Street analysts adjusted their Amazon price targets, now implying potential upside of between 7% and 17%.

item.title: Citi downgrades Nike to neutral after disappointing meeting with CEO
item.description: A meeting with new Nike CEO Elliott Hill didn't convince Citi that the brand can successfully turn its bad luck around.

item.title: Deutsche Bank upgrades Honeywell because of break-up plan, sees 30% upside
item.description: Deutsche Bank cited Honeywell's plans to break up into three parts as a huge catalyst for shares of the multinational conglomerate.
